actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Army to conduct a feasibility study for the project for constructing a dual jetty system at Oregon Inlet, North Carolina, and for other purposes.
short_title: Oregon Inlet Jetty Feasibility Study Act of 2022

summary.text:
Oregon Inlet Jetty Feasibility Study Act of 2022

This bill requires the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers to study and report on the feasibility of constructing a dual jetty system at Oregon Inlet, North Carolina. The Oregon Inlet is located along North Carolina's Outer Banks and joins the Pamlico Sound with the Atlantic Ocean.

titles.title: Oregon Inlet Jetty Feasibility Study Act of 2022
Oregon Inlet Jetty Feasibility Study Act of 2022
To authorize the Secretary of the Army to conduct a feasibility study for the project for constructing a dual jetty system at Oregon Inlet, North Carolina, and for other purposes.
